text: Raja is a 1995 Bollywood action romantic drama movie directed by Indra Kumar. The movie has Sanjay Kapoor and Madhuri Dixit in the title roles. The movie became a hit at the box office. ==Sypnopsis== Madhu and Raja fall in love and decide to get married. However, Madhu's two elder brothers oppose their alliance as Raja does not come from a wealthy family. As the story progresses, the couple discovers that their families share a bitter past. == Cast == * Sanjay Kapoor as Raja * Madhuri Dixit as Madhu Garewal * Paresh Rawal as Brijnath 'Birju' Patangwala * Mukesh Khanna as Rana Mahednra Pratap Garewal * Dalip Tahil as Vishwa Garewal * Rita Bhaduri as Sumitra Garewal ==Soundtrack== The film had songs made by Nadeem-Shravan while lyrics were written by Sameer. All songs were hit that year. title: Raja (1995 movie)
